title: C4$huALL Membership Form
description: _Only for new members_ . Server membership is equivalent to Level 1 membership. Membership perks includes access to announcements, social feeds, teams channels, and more. In answering the form you must understand that the information you provided will be publicly available in the community and aware of the risk of your information being publicly available across the internet. Don't share any sensitive or critical information

questions.placeholder: You can skip this question if you want to, but it was highly recommended to put an answer, for our managers to address you well
Type it in this format MM/DD/YYYY. If you don't want to disclose your age you can just input a random year for YYYY but please five your real birth month (MM) and birth day (DD)
